alert.note: Alert for Colfax; Union (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 09 at 2:55PM MDT until June 09 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Union County in northeastern New Mexico... Northeastern Colfax County in northeastern New Mexico... * Until 400 PM MDT. * At 255 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southeast of Sugarite, or 11 miles east of Raton, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Folsom and Capulin. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 443 and 446. Highway 64 between Mile Markers 342 and 343, and between Mile Markers 352 and 380. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
